channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped paint pots, broken furniture and toys in alley, 6th July
item.description:
These items have been left for over a week at the entrance to the alley.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Hungerford Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Montpellier Street shopping sign & post been hit - leaning over., 6th July
item.description:
Bayshill Road/Montpellier Street junction. Sign on posts has been hit and is leaning over!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Rotunda Tavern Montpellier Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Car parked on pavement, not moved for over a week., 6th July
item.description:
MJ57 UVX black ford mondeo, possibly abandoned as not moved for over a week. Badly parked half of tyres on pavement. Between 1 and 3 Moorfield Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Moorfield Road, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unable to use pavement as it's so overgrown, 5th July
item.description:
Weeds are so bad I'm unable to pass with my push-chair

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Sweetbriar House Chapel Hay Lane, Churchdown

item.title: Footpath overgrown by hedge, 5th July
item.description:
The 2m footpath is overgrown to a degree where you can not use the footpath. It is severely dangerous and a lady was killed further up the same road. The Tewkesbury Road is very busy and cars are going very fast. These children needed to walk in the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coombe Bank A38, Coombe Hill
Report on FixMyStreet
